summary: Define a clear strategy for handling different types of errors returned from core methods in the TypeScript SDK. This involves standardizing error handling across various core operations to ensure consistent and predictable error behavior.
userImpact: Users need a consistent and well-defined way to handle errors from core operations to properly implement error handling in their workflows.
resolutionDetails: Error handling strategy was implemented and standardized across core methods
keyQuote: There are different types of errors that might be returned from the different core methods, define a clear strategy of handling these errors.
